long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IntelliScribe is a light-weight tool that assists with writing revision and enhances writing quality across various platforms. Whether you're crafting an email, composing a message, or writing an article, it seamlessly integrates to provide real-time assistance. With your OpenAI API key ready, the tool offers:

- Grammar corrections
- Clarity improvements 
- Concise and polished content
